New Records: Kristaps Porziņģis scored 25 points, 11 rebounds, two steals, and a block, with 20 points in the paint, setting the tone for the Celtics' win
Key Match Events: Celtics dominated in the paint with 60 points compared to Nuggets' 46
Celtics made only 12 three-pointers on 35 attempts, a strategy due to Nuggets' absence of Nikola Jokic
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Mazzulla praised Porziņģis's physicality and impact on the game
Porziņģis's performance was crucial despite health struggles this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Porziņģis averaged 18.3 points and 6.8 rebounds in 27.9 minutes
The game was a thriller and Porziņģis's return is critical for the playoffs
